# Libcrux SHA3

![pre-verification]

This crate implements [SHA3] (FIPS 202).

It is provides 
- a portable implementation
- an AVX2 optimised implementation
- a Neon optimised implementation

[SHA3]: https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/fips/202/final
[verified]: https://img.shields.io/badge/verified-brightgreen.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
[pre-verification]: https://img.shields.io/badge/pre_verification-orange.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
